name: IdeaTalent
tag_list: data, store-data, data-tracking, software, save-data, health-data, home-data, software-applications
overview:
IdeaTalent LLC is a company that provides data tracking applications for day-to-day activities with online as well as downloadable (offline) options.

Examples of applications include Desktop Health Records, Home maintenance records, Marketing events, Car servicing, Student coursework Info, Sales leads tracker, Travel Log, Job opportunities record keeping, Networking Info etc. Currently there are over 40 applications available and the expectation is to have over 100 applications in the next few months.

The website provides an easy interface for people to store information that gets generated from daily activities and to recall the details from anywhere through a web browser. For people concerned about data security, all applications are also available in a downloadable software format that stores all data on the personâ€™s computer with no connection to the Internet. The website also provides a way for a non-technical user to create a new application in a few minutes for any custom data that they want to track.
